original_text: On the following day Paul went in with us to James, and all the elders were present.
korean_text: 그 이튿날 바울이 우리와 함께 야고보에게로 들어가니 장로들도 다 있더라

sentences.original_text: On the following day Paul went in with us to James
sentences.korean_translation: 그 다음 날 바울이 우리와 함께 야고보에게 들어갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and all the elders were present
